meanings.definition: The quality or state of being speedy.
meanings.sent1: Her speedinesses in running helped her win the race.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah's speedinesses allowed it to catch its prey easily.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise challenged the hare to a race to test their speedinesses.
meanings.sent4: His speedinesses on the basketball court were like lightning.
meanings.sent5: The speedinesses of the delivery service impressed all the customers.

meanings.sent1: The speedinesses of the car on the highway were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The speedinesses of the cheetah made it the fastest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's speedinesses in gathering nuts amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The speedinesses of the river's current carried the boat downstream rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The speedinesses of the rocket launch left everyone in awe.
